config.ShopItemPerRow.name: Shop Item Per Row
config.ShopItemPerRow.description: Number of items per row when a price must be displayed (e.g. regular shops).
config.DresserItemPerRow.name: Dresser Item Per Row
config.DresserItemPerRow.description: Number of items per row when there are no prices (e.g. dressers, catalogues).
config.StackCount.name: Stack Count on Shift+Ctrl
config.StackCount.description: Number of items to buy when using Shift+Ctrl (vanilla 25).
config.EnableSearch.name: Enable Search
config.EnableSearch.description: Enable search box (under the currency display).
